messages.cooldown:
❌ Please wait %{timeleft}% more second(s)
Before reusing the `%{commandname}%` command.

notallowed_to_exec_cmd.title: ❌ You are not allowed to run this command!

description.alloweduserids:
You need to be one of the following users:
> %{commandalloweduserids}%
description.requiredroles:
You need to have one of the Following roles:
> %{commandrequiredroles}%
description.default: Please make sure, to get the needed permissions!

somethingwentwrong_cmd.title: ❌ Something went wrong while, running the: `%{commandname}%` command
